GV04sankharu:4: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen net sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmānaṃ parasmin dadhānīti //
GV04sankharu:6: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen ned indrasyātmānaṃ parasmin dadhānīti //
GV04sankharu:7: atho yam evaitam ṛṅmayaṃ yajurmayaṃ sāmamayaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃskurvanti tasyaiṣa ātmā yan mahāvratam /
GV04sankharu:8: tasmād enat parasmai na śaṃsen net sarveṣāṃ chandasām ātmanaṃ parasmin dadhānīti //
GV04sankharu:10: pitre vācāryāya vātmane haivāsya tacchandastaṃ bhavati /
GV04sankharu:16: atho caturviṃśo vai purastāt kṛto bhavati tasyaiṣa gatir yat pañcaviṃśaḥ /
GV04sankharu:21: atho etad eva paśuṣvaindraṃ rūpaṃ yad ṛṣabhaḥ //
GV04sankharu:23: tasya viśoviśo vo atithim iti dvādaśarcam ājyam /
GV04sankharu:25: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato gāyatryaścānuṣṭubhaśca /
GV04sankharu:26: agniṃ naro dīdhitibhiraraṇyor ityetat pañcaviṃśatyṛcam upasaṃśaṃsati /
GV04sankharu:28: tad vai śastraṃ samṛddhaṃ yat stomena saṃpadyate /
GV04sankharu:29: tasmin vai dve chandasī bhavato virājaśca triṣṭubhaśca /
GV04sankharu:31: catuṣṭayaṃ vā idaṃ sarvam asyaiva sarvasyāptyai /
GV04sankharu:35: kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsa ity vāyavyaṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat /
GV04sankharu:37: ata evottaraṃ tṛcam aindravāyavaṃ yāvattarastanvo yāvadoja iti yāvannaraścakṣasā dīdhyānā ityetena rūpeṇa /
GV04sankharu:38: ud vāṃ cakṣurvaruṇa supratīkam iti maitrāvaruṇaṃ devayoreti sūryastatanvān ityetena rūpeṇa /
GV04sankharu:39: ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānām ityāśvinaṃ yaṃ Suryasya duhitāvṛṇītetyetena rūpeṇa /
GV04sankharu:40: kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur ityaindraṃ mahadvad vṛdhavat
GV04sankharu:42: ko vastrāta vasavaḥ kau varūteti vaiśvadevaṃ sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martād ityetena rūpeṇa /
GV04sankharu:43: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇeti sarasvataṃ dvārāvṛtasya subhago vyāvar ityetena rūpeṇa /
GV04sankharu:44: eṣa vā u kadvāṃstraiṣṭubhas tṛcakl̥pto vāmadevyaḥ praügaḥ /
GV04sankharu:45: prajāpatir vai vāmadevaḥ prajāpatāveva tat sarvān kāman ṛdhnuvanti /
GV04sankharu:46: tad āhur na traiṣṭubhaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ syāt /
GV04sankharu:53: ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaya iti marutvatīyasya pratipat /
GV04sankharu:57: asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivega iti vāsukraṃ pūrvaṃ śastvā mahāṁ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā ityetasmiṃstraiṣṭubhe nividaṃ dadhāti /
GV04sankharu:60: atha yad mahāṁ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā iti mahadvat /
GV04sankharu:67: etābhir vai devāḥ sarvā aṣṭīr āśnuvata /
GV04sankharu:68: tatho evaitad yajamānā etābhir eva sarvā aṣṭīr aśnuvate /
GV04sankharu:76: atha vai parimādo yan nakhāni dantās tanūr lomānīti /
GV04sankharu:89: caivaṃ stuvīran yadi ca stuvīran anveva japet //
GV04sankharu:91: tāni vā etani sapta devacchandāṃsi bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:96: athātraiva tiṣṭhann agniṃ yathāṅgam upatiṣṭhate namo nama iti /
GV04sankharu:100: ākāśaṃ śālāyai kuryur iti haika āhuḥ /
GV04sankharu:101: deśena tvevopatiṣṭheta tirohito ha vā eṣa etasmin parama ukthe parama āśiṣo vadati - saṃ mahān mahatyādadhād iti /
GV04sankharu:102: agnir vai mahan iyaṃ pṛthivī mahatī /
GV04sankharu:113: viśvāmitro ha vā indrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma śastreṇa ca vratacaryayā /
GV04sankharu:114: taṃ hendra uvāca viśvāmitra varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti /
GV04sankharu:115: sa hovāca viśvāmitras tvām eva vijānīyām iti /
GV04sankharu:120: taṃ hendra uvāca mahāṃśca mahatī cāsmi /
GV04sankharu:123: tata u ha viśvāmitro vijijñāsām eva cakre /
GV04sankharu:124: taṃ hendra uvācaitad vā aham asmi yad etad avocaṃ yad vā ṛṣe 'to bhūyo 'tapās tadeva tat syād yad aham iti /
GV04sankharu:125: tad vā indro vyāhṛtīr ūce tā upāptā āsann iti /
GV04sankharu:126: athopanidhāya preṅkhaphalakaṃ trir abhyanya trir abhyavān iti //
GV04sankharu:130: athainad urasā saṃspṛśya dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - arko 'si vasavastvā gāyatreṇa cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha /
GV04sankharu:132: rājyaṃ ha vā idam u haiva cakṣate /
GV04sankharu:133: athottaraṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - rudrāstvā traiṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha /
GV04sankharu:135: svārājyaṃ ha vai rājyād adhitarām iva /
GV04sankharu:136: atha dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - ādityāstvā jagatena cchandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha /
GV04sankharu:138: sāmrājyaṃ ha vai svārājyād adhitarām iva /
GV04sankharu:139: athottaraṃ bhāgam ātmano 'tiharañ japati - viśve tvā devā ānuṣṭubhena chandasārohantu te ta āroḷhāra ityeva tad āha /
GV04sankharu:142: atha samadhisṛpya prāñcau pādā upāvahṛtya bhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayati /
GV04sankharu:143: udyatataro ha vā eṣo 'smāl lokād bhavati /
GV04sankharu:147: atha trit abhanya trir abhyavān iti /
GV04sankharu:148: athopari preṅkhaphalake dakṣiṇottariṇam upasthaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇena prādeśena paścāt prāṅ preṅkhaphalakam upaspṛśati /
GV04sankharu:149: prajāpatiṣ ṭvā rohatu vāyuḥ preṅkhayatv iti /
GV04sankharu:150: prajāpatir vā etad ārohati vāyuḥ preṅkhayati yaj jīvam /
GV04sankharu:151: atha trir abhanya trir abhavān iti /
GV04sankharu:156: saṃ cakṣur manasā sam ahaṃ manasā,
GV04sankharu:157: saṃ prajāpatiḥ paśubhiḥ sam ahaṃ paśubhir ityāśiṣam eva tad vadate /
GV04sankharu:160: premāṃ vācaṃ vadiṣyāmīti pravadiṣyan hyeṣa etāṃ vācaṃ vadati bahu kariṣyantīṃ bahu kariṣyann iti /
GV04sankharu:163: bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyantīṃ bahor bhūyaḥ kariṣyann iti bahor bhūyo hyeṣā vāk kariṣyantī bhavati bahor bhūyo 'yaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ prāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:164: svar gamiṣyantīṃ svar gamiṣyann iti svar hyeṣā vāg gamiṣyantī bhavati svar ayaṃ ya etasyāhnaḥ śastraṃ prāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:165: svar imān yajamānān vakṣyan ity eva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:166: yaṃ dviṣyāt taṃ brūyān nā nāmuṃ nāmum iti /
GV04sankharu:167: sa yāvato ha vā eṣa etasmād devasthāt pratisaṃkhyāya nirdhūnute niṣ ṭad dhūnute /
GV04sankharu:171: vāyur vā eṣa prāṇo bhūtvaitad ukthaṃ śaṃsati /
GV04sankharu:175: gurau vā eṣa yukto bhavati ya etasyāhnaḥ śatraṃ prāpnoti,
GV04sankharu:176: tasya gurau yuktasyeśvaraḥ prāṇo yadi nāpaparājetoḥ /
GV04sankharu:179: na ha vā etasyai devatāyai digdhena nāsinā na paraśunā na kenacanāvatardo 'sti /
GV04sankharu:180: tad ya evaṃ vidvāṃsam apavadati sa eva pāpīyān bhavati /
GV04sankharu:187: prāṇo vai hiṃkāraḥ prāṇenaivaitad ukthaṃ pratipadyate /
GV04sankharu:188: atho ūrg vai raso hiṃkāra ūrjam eva tad rasam etasmin ukthe dadhāti /
GV04sankharu:189: atho amṛtatvaṃ vai hiṃkāro 'mṛtatvam eva tad ātman dhatte /
GV04sankharu:191: etad vai pratyakṣaṃ sāma yad rājanam /
GV04sankharu:200: vāg vā etad ahar manas tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaḥ /
GV04sankharu:202: tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham iti stotriyastṛcaḥ /
GV04sankharu:203: vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojā iti vṛdhavan mahadvat /
GV04sankharu:207: ātmā vai pañcaviṃśaḥ prajā paśava upasargaḥ /
GV04sankharu:208: prajayaiva tat paśubhiḥ preṣyair annādyenetyātmānam upasṛjate /
GV04sankharu:209: nadaṃ va odatīnām iti traiṣṭubhāni pūrvāṇi padāni karoti nadasyottarāṇi /
GV04sankharu:210: prathamena traiṣṭubhena padena prathamaṃ nadasya padam uṣasamādhāyāvasyati /
GV04sankharu:216: yā tṛtīyā sūktasya tasyā uttaram ardharcam utsṛjati nadasya cottaram /
GV04sankharu:217: so 'yaṃ mukhasya vivaras tena vācaṃ vadati mukhena vai vācaṃ vadati /
GV04sankharu:218: tau purastād dvipadānāṃ śaṃsati tathā hāsya stotriyānantarhitā bhavatyātmānaṃ śastvā /
GV04sankharu:220: atho āpo vai sūdadohā adbhir vā imāni parvāṇi saṃhitāni bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:221: atho amṛtatvaṃ vai sūdadohā amṛtatvaṃ eva tad ātman dhatte /
GV04sankharu:223: tad yathā ha vai dāruṇaḥ śleṣma saṃśleṣaṇaṃ syāt paricarmaṇyaṃ vaivam tṛcāśītir evasūdadohāḥ sarveṣāṃ vedānāṃ śaṃśleṣiṇī //
GV04sankharu:227: trīṇi vā asya śīrṣṇaḥ kapālāni bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:229: tāni trīṇi punarevaikaṃ tredhā tredhā tā nava ṛco bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:236: trīṇi vā āsāṃ grīvāṇāṃ parvāṇi bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:244: ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū iti bāhvor abhirūpā /
GV04sankharu:254: sa eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām iti sūktaṃ tat pacchaḥ /
GV04sankharu:255: tasya dvitīyām uddhṛtya viśvo hyanyo arirājagāmeti /
GV04sankharu:256: yaitasya dvitīyā tām iha dvitīyāṃ karoti /
GV04sankharu:261: trīṇi vā asya pāṇeḥ parvāṇi bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:264: tasmād ayam aṅguṣṭhaḥ sarvā aṅgulīḥ pratyeti /
GV04sankharu:268: tau vā etau pakṣau bārhatarāthantarau caturviṃśau /
GV04sankharu:276: sapta vai chandāṃsi sarveṣām eva chandasām āptyai /
GV04sankharu:281: stotriyān evaitābhir anuśaṃsati gāyatryā gāyatram auṣṇihyā ca bārhatyā ca bṛhadrathantare /
GV04sankharu:282: iyam eva dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gāyatrī savyam auṣṇihī madhyaṃ bārhatī /
GV04sankharu:291: mahāṁ indro ya ojasetyetayā gāyatrīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stomair vatsasya vāvṛdha iti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā /
GV04sankharu:295: yā indra bhuja ābhara ityetayā bārhatīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate stotāram in maghavann asya vardhayeti mahadvatyā vṛdhavatyā /
GV04sankharu:298: ayaṃ te astu haryata ā mandrair indra haribhiḥ sūkte /
GV04sankharu:299: tad yad ete antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir bṛhatībhir auṣṇihīm aśītiṃ samārohāṇīti //
GV04sankharu:301: indraḥ suteṣu someṣv ityetayauṣṇihīm aśītiṃ pratipadyate vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣa iti vṛdhavatyā mahadvatyā /
GV04sankharu:304: tā vā etā aśītayaḥ saṃśastāḥ saptaviṃśatiśatānyṛcāṃ saṃpadyante /
GV04sankharu:305: sapta vai viṃśati śatāni saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇāṃ tad aśītibhiḥ saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:308: bārhatyā aśītyā aśītiṃ caturakṣarāṇyuddharati kākubhebhyaḥ pragāthebhyaś caturviṃśatiṃ caturakṣarāṇi tāni catuḥśataṃ caturakṣarāṇi catuḥśate gāyatrīṣūpadadhāti /
GV04sankharu:313: tad yad etad antataḥ śaṃsati saṃsiddhābhir uṣṇigbhir vaśaṃ samārohāṇīti //
GV04sankharu:318: yad ataḥ kiṃca bahirdhā tata eva tac chrapayati yad antar udare /
GV04sankharu:319: tasmād bahvyo devatā bahūni cchandāṃsi vaśe śasyante /
GV04sankharu:320: tasmād idaṃ bahu viśvarūpam udare 'nnam avadhīyate /
GV04sankharu:327: pratiṣṭhānīyaṃ vai chando dvipadāḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva //
GV04sankharu:337: vāg vā etad ahar vāg anuṣṭub vācyeva tad vācaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati /
GV04sankharu:339: sa pratnathā kavivṛdha iti tṛcam arkavat tena samṛddham /
GV04sankharu:345: +indrasyaivaitac chando yat triṣṭup tad enaṃ svena chandasā samardhayati /
GV04sankharu:346: hairaṇyastūpīyaṃ ca yātaūtīyaṃ ca bārhatarāthantare bṛhadrathantare hi purastāt kṛte bhavataḥ /
GV04sankharu:347: sajanīyaṃ cādhvaryavo bharatendrāya somam iti ca tāḥ saptaviṃśatir ṛco bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:356: tad yathā vraje paśūn avasṛjyārgaleṣīke parivyayet /
GV04sankharu:357: evam evaitaiḥ padānuṣaṅgaiḥ sarvān kāmān ubhayataḥ parigṛhyātman dhatte /
GV04sankharu:369: yāvacchastraṃ upasarjanyāṃ saṃkhyāyamānāyām ṛte tūṣṇīṃśaṃsaṃ bṛhatīsahasraṃ saṃpadyate /
GV04sankharu:370: tasya vā etasya bṛhatīsahasrasya ṣaṭtriṃśad akṣarāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:379: bārhato vā eṣa ya eṣa tapati /
GV04sankharu:384: ekāhikī yājyā pratiṣṭhā vā ekāhaḥ pratiṣṭhityā eva /
GV04sankharu:386: sagraham evāyaṃ taṃ prāṅ upāvarohati pratyaṅ preṅkhaphalakam apohati /
GV04sankharu:387: parāmṛśan grahaṃ japati - yam imaṃ prajayaṃ prājaiṣaṃ tam anvasānīti ned asmāt prajayād ātmānam apādadhānīti /
GV04sankharu:390: prajāpatir viśvakarmā tad enaṃ svena rūpeṇa samardhayati /
GV04sankharu:393: tata u ha dīrghatamā daśa puruṣāyuṣāṇi jijīva /
GV04sankharu:394: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuga iti /
GV04sankharu:395: tad etay āyuṣkāmasya śastram iti ha smāha kauṣītakiḥ /
GV04sankharu:396: tad ya evaṃ vidvān etad ahaḥ śaṃsati sarvam āyur asmiṃl loka eti /
GV04sankharu:405: tad devasya savitur vāryaṃ mahad iti sāvitraṃ mahadvat/
GV04sankharu:407: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśaṃbhuva iti dyāvāpṛthivīyam uruvyacaso mahinī asaścateti mahadvat /
GV04sankharu:409: kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagann ityārbhavam /
GV04sankharu:410: na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākula iti mahadvat /
GV04sankharu:412: asya vāmasya palitasya hotur iti salilaṃ vaiśvadevam /
GV04sankharu:419: bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatheti bṛhadvat /
GV04sankharu:421: baḷa ityā tad vapeṣu dhāyi darśitam iti jātavedasīyaṃ tasya astāvyagniḥ śimīvadbhir arkair ity arkavatyuttamā /
GV04sankharu:428: te 'mṛtatvam āpnuvanti ya etad ahar upayanti ya etad ahar upayanti //
GV04sankharu:432: citro ha vai gāṅgyāyanir yakṣyamāṇa āruṇiṃ vavre /
GV04sankharu:433: sa ha putraṃ śvetaketuṃ prajighāya yājayeti /
GV04sankharu:435: asti saṃvṛtaṃ loke yasmin mā dhāsyasi,
GV04sankharu:438: sa hovāca - nāham etad veda hantācāryaṃ pṛcchānīti /
GV04sankharu:439: sa ha pitaram āsādya papraccha - itīti māprākṣīt kathaṃ pratibravāṇīti /
GV04sankharu:440: sa hovāca - aham apyetan na veda /
GV04sankharu:441: sadasyeva vayaṃ svādhyāyam adhītya harāmahe yan naḥ pare dadati /
GV04sankharu:443: sa hi samitpāṇiś citraṃ gāṅgyāyaniṃ praticakrama upāyānīti /
GV04sankharu:444: taṃ hovāca - brahmārho 'si gotama yo na mānam upāgāḥ /
GV04sankharu:447: sa hovāca ye vai ke cāsmāl lokāt prayanti candramasam eva te sarvaṃ gacchanti /
GV04sankharu:450: etad vai svargasya lokasya dvāraṃ yac candramāḥ /
GV04sankharu:452: atha yo na pratyāha tam iha vṛṣṭir bhūtvā varṣati /
GV04sankharu:453: sa iha kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā matsyo vā śakunir vā siṃho vā varāho vā paraśvā vā śārdūlo vā puruṣo vānyo vā teṣu teṣu sthaneṣu pratyājāyate yathākarma yathāvidyam /
GV04sankharu:455: taṃ pratibrūyāt - vicakṣaṇād ṛtavo reta ābhṛtaṃ pañcadaśāt prasūtāt pitryāvataḥ /
GV04sankharu:456: tan mā puṃsi kartaryerayadhvaṃ puṃsā kartrā mātari māsiṣiñca //
GV04sankharu:458: dvādaśatrayodaśena pitrā saṃ tad vide 'haṃ prati tad vide 'haṃ tan ma ṛtavo 'mṛtyava ārambhadhvam //
GV04sankharu:459: tena satyena tena tapasā ṛtur asmi ārtavo 'smi /
GV04sankharu:462: sa etaṃ devayānaṃ panthānam āpadyāgnilokam āgacchati /
GV04sankharu:484: taṃ brahmāha - abhidhāva ta mama yaśasā /
GV04sankharu:488: taṃ pañca śatānyapsarasāṃ pratiyanti - śataṃ phalahastāḥ,
GV04sankharu:505: tad yathā rathena dhāvayan rathacakre paryavekṣeta /
GV04sankharu:508: sa eṣa visukṛto duṣkṛto brahma vidvān brahmaivābhipraiti //
GV04sankharu:528: tasya bhūtaṃ ca bhaviṣyac ca pūrvau pādau /
GV04sankharu:552: yad anyad devebhyaśca prāṇebhyaś ca tat sat /
GV04sankharu:553: atha yad devāś ca prāṇāś ca tat satyam /
GV04sankharu:560: sa brahmeti vijñeya ṛṣir brahmamayo mahān //
GV04sankharu:562: tad āha - kena me pauṃsnāni nāmānyāpnoṣīti /
GV04sankharu:586: tam āha - āpo vai khalu me loko 'yaṃ te 'sāv iti /
GV04sankharu:587: sā yā brahmaṇo jitir yā vyaṣṭiḥ,
GV04sankharu:589: tāṃ vyaṣṭiṃ vyaśnute ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:594: tasya vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo mano dūtam,
GV04sankharu:598: sa yo ha vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo mano dūtaṃ veda dūtavān bhavati /
GV04sankharu:602: tasmai vā etasmai brahmaṇa etā devatā ayācamānāya baliṃ haranti /
GV04sankharu:603: evaṃ haivāsmai sarvāṇi bhūtānyayācamānāyaiva baliṃ haranti ya evaṃ veda /
GV04sankharu:605: tad yathā grāmaṃ bhikṣitvālabdhvupaviśen nāham ato dattam aśnīyām iti /
GV04sankharu:606: ta evainam upamantrayante ye purastāt pratyācakṣīran /
GV04sankharu:608: annadās tvevainam upamantrayante - dadāma ta iti //
GV04sankharu:611: tasya vā etasya prāṇasya brahmaṇo vāk parastāc cakṣur ārundhate /
GV04sankharu:615: tasmai vā etasmai prāṇāya brahmaṇa etā devatā ayācamānāya baliṃ haranti /
GV04sankharu:616: evaṃ haivāsmai sarvāṇi bhūtānyayācamānāyaiva baliṃ haranti /
GV04sankharu:617: ya evaṃ veda tasyopaniṣan na yāced iti /
GV04sankharu:618: tad yathā grāmaṃ bhikṣitvālabdhvupaviśen nāham ato dattam aśnīyām iti /
GV04sankharu:619: ta evainam upamantrayante ye purastāt pratyācakṣīran /
GV04sankharu:621: annadās tvevainam upamantrayante - dadāma ta iti //
GV04sankharu:624_0: ya ekadhanam abhidhyāyāt paurṇamāsyāṃ vāmāvāsyāyāṃ vā śuddhapakṣe vā puṇye nakṣatra
GV04sankharu:624_1: eteṣām ekasmin parvaṇyagnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ
GV04sankharu:625: vāṅ nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā /
GV04sankharu:626: prāṇo nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā /
GV04sankharu:627: śrotraṃ nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā /
GV04sankharu:628: mano nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā /
GV04sankharu:629: prajñā nāma devatāvarodhinī sā me 'muṣmād idam avarundhyāt tasyai svāhā /
GV04sankharu:630: atha dhūmagandhaṃ prajighrāyājyalepanenāṅgānyanuvimṛjya vācaṃyamo 'bhipravrajyārthaṃ +brūyād dūtaṃ vā prahiṇuyāt /
GV04sankharu:634: yasya priyo bubhūṣed yasyai yeṣāṃ vā yāsāṃ vaiteṣām evaikasmin parvaṇyetayaivāvṛtaitā ājyāhutīr juhoti /
GV04sankharu:641: atha dhūmagandhaṃ prajighrāyājyalepanenāṅgānyanuvimṛjya vācaṃyamo 'bhipravrajy saṃsparśaṃ jigamiṣet /
GV04sankharu:648: yāvad vai puruṣo bhāṣate na tāvat prāṇituṃ śaknoti /
GV04sankharu:650: yāvad vai puruṣaḥ prāṇiti na tāvad bhāṣituṃ śaknoti /
GV04sankharu:652: ete anante amṛte āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca saṃtataṃ juhoti /
GV04sankharu:653: atha yā anyā āhutayo 'ntavatyas tāḥ karmamayyo hi bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:654: tad dha smaitat pūrve vidvāṃso 'gnihotraṃ na juhavāñcakruḥ //
GV04sankharu:666: tad yathaitac chrīmattamaṃ yaśasvitamaṃ tejasvitamam iti śastreṣu bhavati /
GV04sankharu:667: evaṃ haiva sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu śrīmattamo yaśasvitamas tejasitamo bhavati ya evaṃ veda /
GV04sankharu:668: tad etad aiṣṭikaṃ karma yam ātmānam adhvaryuḥ saṃskaroti /
GV04sankharu:673: eṣa u evaitad indrasyātmā bhavati ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:676: sarvajid dha sma kauṣītakir udyantam ādityam upatiṣṭhate yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvodakam ānīya triḥ prasicyodakapātram /
GV04sankharu:682: tad yad ahorātrābhyāṃ pāpaṃ karoti saṃ tad vṛṅkte /
GV04sankharu:684: yad ahorātrābhyāṃ pāpaṃ karoti saṃ tad vṛṅkte //
GV04sankharu:686: atha māsimāsyāvāsyāyāṃ vṛttāyāṃ paścāc candramasaṃ dṛśyamānam upatiṣṭhetaitayaivāvṛtā /
GV04sankharu:687: haritatṛṇe vā pratyasya - yan me susīmaṃ hṛdayaṃ divi candramasi śritam /
GV04sankharu:688: manye 'haṃ māṃ tad vidvāṃsaṃ māhaṃ putryam aghaṃ rudam //
GV04sankharu:690: na hyasmāt pūrvā prajā praitīti nu jātaputrasya /
GV04sankharu:692: saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ,
GV04sankharu:693: yam ādityā aṃśum āpyāyayantītyetās tisra ṛco japitvā - māsmākaṃ prāṇena prajayā paśubhir āpyāyayiṣṭhāḥ /
GV04sankharu:694: yo' smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇena prajayā paśubhir āpyāyayasvetyaindrīm āvṛtam āvarta ādityasyāvṛtam anvāvarta iti dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum anvāvartate //
GV04sankharu:696: atha paurṇamāsyāṃ purastāc candramasaṃ dṛśyamānam upatiṣṭhaitayaivāvṛtā /
GV04sankharu:698: brāhmaṇas ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena rājño 'tsi /
GV04sankharu:700: rājā ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena viśo 'tsi /
GV04sankharu:702: śyenas ta ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhena pakṣiṇo 'tsi /
GV04sankharu:704: agniṣ ṭa ekaṃ mukhaṃ tena mukhenemaṃ lokam atsi /
GV04sankharu:707: yo' smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya prāṇena prajayā paśubhir apakṣīyasveti daivīm āvṛtam āvarta ādityasyāvṛtam anvāvarta iti dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum anvāvartate //
GV04sankharu:709: atha saṃvekṣyan jāyāyai hṛdayam abhi mṛśet - yat te susīme hṛdayaṃ śritam antaḥ prajāpatau /
GV04sankharu:710: tenāmṛtatvasyeśāne mā tvaṃ putryam aghaṃ ni gā iti //
GV04sankharu:713: atha proṣyāyan putrasya mūrdhanam abhijighret - aṅgād aṅgāt saṃbhavasi hṛdayād adhi jāyase /
GV04sankharu:714: ātmā vai putranāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam iti nāmāsya dadhāti /
GV04sankharu:717: tejo vai putrānāmāsi sa jīva śaradaḥ śatam iti nāmāsya gṛhṇāti /
GV04sankharu:719: yena prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ paryagṛhṇāt tad ariṣṭyaitena tvā parigṛhṇāmi, asāv iti /
GV04sankharu:720: athāsya dakṣiṇe karṇe japati - asme prayandhi maghavann ṛjīṣin iti /
GV04sankharu:722: mā bhetthā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ śataṃ śarada āyuṣaḥ /
GV04sankharu:723: jīvasva putra te nāmnā mūrdhānam abhijighrāmīti trir asya mūrdānam abhijighret /
GV04sankharu:724: gavāṃ tvāṃ hiṃkāreṇābhihiṃkaromīti trir asya mūrdhānam abhihiṃkaroti //
GV04sankharu:727: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad agnir jvalati /
GV04sankharu:729: tasyādityam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ /
GV04sankharu:730: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad ādityo dṛśyate /
GV04sankharu:732: tasya candramasam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ /
GV04sankharu:733: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac candramā dṛśyate /
GV04sankharu:735: tasya vidyutam eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ /
GV04sankharu:736: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad vidyud vidyotate /
GV04sankharu:738: tasyādiśa eva tejo gacchati vāyuṃ prāṇaḥ /
GV04sankharu:739: tā vā etā sarvā devatā vāyum eva praviśya vāyau mṛtvā na mṛcchante /
GV04sankharu:744: etad vai brahma dīpyate yad vācā vadati /
GV04sankharu:748: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac cakṣuṣā paśyati /
GV04sankharu:752: etad vai brahma dīpyate yac chrotreṇa śṛṇoti /
GV04sankharu:756: etad vai brahma dīpyate yan manasā dhyāyati /
GV04sankharu:760: tā vā etā sarvā devatā prāṇam eva praviśya prāṇe mṛtvā na mṛcchante /
GV04sankharu:762: tad yad iha vā evaṃ vidvāṃsam ubhau parvatāv abhipravarteyātāṃ dakṣiṇaścottaraś ca tustūrṣamāṇau na hainaṃ stṛṇvīyātām /
GV04sankharu:763: atha ya enaṃ dviṣanti yāṃś ca svayaṃ dveṣṭi ta evainaṃ parimriyante //
GV04sankharu:766: etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vividamānā asmāc charīrād uccakramuḥ /
GV04sankharu:772: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chiśya eva /
GV04sankharu:774: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chrotreṇa śṛṇvac chiśya eva /
GV04sankharu:776: tad vācā vadac cakṣuṣā paśyac chrotreṇa śṛṇvan manasā dhyāyac chiśya eva /
GV04sankharu:779: tā vā etā sarvā devatā prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā prāṇam eva prajñātmānam abhisaṃbhūya +sahaivaitaiḥ sarvair asmāc charīrād uccakramuḥ /
GV04sankharu:781: tatho evaivaṃ vidvān prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā prāṇam eva prajñātmānam abhisaṃbhūya +sahaivaitaiḥ sarvair asmāc charīrād utkrāmati /
GV04sankharu:785: tad amṛto bhavati ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:789: navais tṛṇair agāraṃ saṃstīryāgnim upasamādhāyodakumbhaṃ sapātram upanidhāyāhatena vāsasā saṃpracchannaḥ pitā śete /
GV04sankharu:790: etya putra upariṣṭād abhinipadyata indriyair indriyāṇi saṃspṛśya /
GV04sankharu:794: vācaṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:796: prāṇaṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:798: cakṣus te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:800: śrotraṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:802: annarasāṃs te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:804: pitā / karmāṇi te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:806: sukhaduḥkhe te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:807: ānandaṃ ratiṃ prajātiṃ me tvayi dadhānīti pitā /
GV04sankharu:808: ānandaṃ ratiṃ prajātiṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:810: ityāṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:811: dhiyo vijñātavyaṃ kāmān me tvayi dadhānīti pitā /
GV04sankharu:812: dhiyo vijñātavyaṃ kāmāṃs te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:814: manas te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:816: prajñāṃ te mayi dadha iti putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:817: yad u vā upābhigadaḥ syāt samāsenaiva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:822: yaśo brahmavarcasaṃ kīrtis tvā juṣatām iti /
GV04sankharu:824: pāṇināntardhāya vasanāntena vā pracchādya svargāṁl lokān kāmān āpnuhīti /
GV04sankharu:825: sa yadyugadaḥ syāt putrasyaiśvarye pitā vaset /
GV04sankharu:828: yathā samāpayitavyo bhavati yathā samāpayitavyo bhavati //
GV04sankharu:832: pratardano ha vai daivodāsir indrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca /
GV04sankharu:833: taṃ indra uvāca pratardanaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti /
GV04sankharu:834: sa hovāca pratardanaḥ - tvam eva me vṛṇīṣva yaṃ tvaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manyasa iti /
GV04sankharu:835: taṃ indra uvāca - na vai varo 'varasmai vṛṇīte /
GV04sankharu:837: avaro vai kila meti hovāca pratardanaḥ /
GV04sankharu:840: taṃ hendra uvāca - mām eva vijānīhi /
GV04sankharu:841: etad evāhaṃ manuṣyāya hitatamaṃ manye yo māṃ vijānīyāt /
GV04sankharu:844: bahvīḥ saṃdhā atrikramya divi prahlādīyān atṛṇaham antarikṣe,
GV04sankharu:847: sa yo māṃ veda na ha vai tasya kena ca karmaṇā loko mīyate /
GV04sankharu:848: na steyena na bhrūṇahatyayā na mātṛvadhena na pitṛvadhena /
GV04sankharu:849: nādya pāpaṃ cakruṣo mukhān nīlaṃ vyetīti //
GV04sankharu:855: yāvad +dhyasmin śarīre prāṇo bhavati yāvad āyuḥ /
GV04sankharu:858: sa yo mām āyur amṛtam ityupāste /
GV04sankharu:861: tad dhaika āhur ekabhūyaṃ vai prāṇā gacchantīti /
GV04sankharu:862: na hi kaścana śaknuyāt sakṛd vācā nāma prajñāpayituṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ śrotreṇa śabdaṃ manasā dhyātum /
GV04sankharu:863: ekabhūyaṃ vai prāṇā bhūtvaivaikaikam etāni sarvāṇi prajñāpayantīti /
GV04sankharu:869: evam u haitad iti hendra uvāca /
GV04sankharu:883: atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati /
GV04sankharu:890: yatraitat puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati /
GV04sankharu:892: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti /
GV04sankharu:898: visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante /
GV04sankharu:901: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati /
GV04sankharu:908: yatraitat puruṣa ārto mariṣyann ābalyam etya saṃmoham eti /
GV04sankharu:915: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti /
GV04sankharu:919: sa yadāsmāc charīrād utkrāmati sahaivaitaiḥ sarvair utkrāmati //
GV04sankharu:932: atha yathāsmai prajñāyai sarvāṇi bhūtānyekaṃ bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:950: tasyānando ratiḥ prajātiḥ parastāt prativihitā bhūtamātrā /
GV04sankharu:954: tasya dhīḥ kāmāḥ parastāt prativihitā bhūtamātrā //
GV04sankharu:956: prajñayā vācaṃ samāruhya vācā sarvāṇi nāmānyāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:957: prajñayā prāṇaṃ samāruhya prāṇena sarvān gandhān āpnoti /
GV04sankharu:958: prajñayā cakṣuḥ samāruhya cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇyāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:959: prajñayā śrotraṃ samāruhya śrotreṇa sarvāñ chabdān āpnoti /
GV04sankharu:960: prajñayā jihvāṃ samāruhya jihvayā sarvān rasān āpnoti /
GV04sankharu:961: prajñayā hastau samāruhya hastābhyāṃ sarvāṇi karmāṇyāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:962: prajñayā śarīraṃ samāruhya śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkhe āpnoti /
GV04sankharu:964: prajñayā pādau samāruhya pādābhyāṃ sarvā ityā āpnoti /
GV04sankharu:965: prajñayā manaḥ samāruhya manasā sarvāṇi dhyātānyāpnoti /
GV04sankharu:967: na hi prajñāpetā vāṅ nāma kiṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:970: na hi prajñāpetaḥ prāṇo gandhaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:973: na hi prajñāpetaṃ cakṣū rūpaṃ kiṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:976: na hi prajñāpetaṃ śrotraṃ śabdaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:979: na hi prajñāpetā jihvānnarasaṃ kaṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:982: na hi prajñāpetau hastau karma kiṃcana prajñāpayetām /
GV04sankharu:985: na hi prajñāpetaṃ śarīraṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kiṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:987: nāham etaṃ na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ prājñāsiṣam iti /
GV04sankharu:988: na hi prajñāpeta upastha ānandaṃ na ratiṃ na prajātiṃ kāṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:990: nāham etam ānandaṃ na ratiṃ prajātiṃ prājñāsiṣam iti
GV04sankharu:991: / na hi prajñāpetau pādāv ityāṃ kāṃcana prajñāpayet /
GV04sankharu:994: na hi prajñāpetā dhīḥ kāṃcana sidhyet,
GV04sankharu:1011: nānandaṃ na ratiṃ na prajātiṃ vijijñāsīti /
GV04sankharu:1017: tā vā etā daśaiva bhūtamātrā adhiprajñam /
GV04sankharu:1019: yad dhi bhūtamātrā na syur na prajñāmātrāḥ syuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1020: yad vā prajñāmātrā na syur na bhūtamātrāḥ syuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1027: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmānanto 'jaro 'mṛto na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyān bhavati np evāsādhunā kanīyān /
GV04sankharu:1028: eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GV04sankharu:1029: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate /
GV04sankharu:1033: sa ma ātmeti vidyāt sa ma ātmeti vidyāt //
GV04sankharu:1037: atha gārgyo bālākir anūcānaḥ saṃspaṣṭa āsa /
GV04sankharu:1038: so 'vasad uśīnareṣu so 'vasan matsyeṣu kurupañcāleṣu kāśivideheṣviti /
GV04sankharu:1039: sa hājātaśatruṃ kāśyam āvrajyovāca - brahma te bravāṇīti /
GV04sankharu:1040: taṃ hovācājataśatruḥ - sahasraṃ dadmi ta ityetasyāṃ vāci /
GV04sankharu:1041: janako janaka iti vā u janā dhāvantīti //
GV04sankharu:1060: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa āditye puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1062: bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsā atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ Mūrdheti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1063: sa yo haitam evam upāste 'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrdhā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1065: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa candramasi puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1067: annasyātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1068: sa yo haitam evam upāste 'nnasyātmā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1070: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa vidyuti puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1072: satyasyātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1073: sa yo haitam evam upāste satyasyātmā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1075: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa stanayitnau puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1077: śabdasyātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1078: sa yo haitam evam upāste śabdasyātmā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1080: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa vāyau puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1082: indro vaikuṇṭho 'parājitā seneti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1083: sa yo haitam evam upāste jiṣṇur ha vā aparājiṣṇur anyatastyajāyī bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1085: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa ākāśe puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1087: pūṛnam apravarti brahmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1088: sa yo haitam evam upāste pūryate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1090: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣo 'gnau puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1092: viṣāsahir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1093: sa yo haitam evam upāste viṣāsahir haivānyeṣu bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1095: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣo 'psu puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1097: tejasa ātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1098: sa yo haitam evam upāste tejasa ātmā bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1102: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa ādarśe puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1104: pratirūpa iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1105: sa yo haitam evam upāste pratirūpo haivāsya prajāyām ājāyate nāpratirūpaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1107: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa cchāyāyāṃ puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1109: dvitīyo 'napaga iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1110: sa yo haitam evam upāste vindate dvitīyāt /
GV04sankharu:1113: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa pratiśrutkāyāṃ puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1115: asur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1116: sa yo haitam evam upāste na purā kālāt saṃmoham eti //
GV04sankharu:1118: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa śabde puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1120: mṛtyur iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1121: sa yo haitam evam upāste na purā kālāt praiti //
GV04sankharu:1123: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - yenaitat puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnayā carati tamu evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1125: yamo rājeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1126: sa yo haitam evam upāste sarvaṃ hāsmā idaṃ śraiṣṭhyāya yamyate //
GV04sankharu:1128: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa śarīre puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1130: prajāpatir iti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1131: sa yo haitam evam upāste prajāyate prajayā paśbhir yaśasā brahmavaracasema svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1133: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa dakṣiṇe 'kṣiṇi puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1135: vāca ātmāgner ātmā jyotiṣa ātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1136: sa yo haitam evam upāste eteṣāṃ sarveṣām ātmā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1138: sa hovāca bālākiḥ - ya evaiṣa savye 'kṣiṇi puruṣas tam evāham upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1140: satyasyātm vidyuta ātmā tejasa ātmeti vā aham etam upāsa iti /
GV04sankharu:1141: sa yo haitam evam upāste eteṣāṃ sarveṣām ātmā bhavati //
GV04sankharu:1143: tata u ha bālākis tūṣṇīm āsa /
GV04sankharu:1144: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - etāvān nu bālākā3 iti /
GV04sankharu:1146: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - mṛṣā vai khalu mā saṃvādayiṣṭhā brahma te bravāṇīti /
GV04sankharu:1147: sa hovāca - yo vai bālāka eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitat karma sa vai veditavya iti /
GV04sankharu:1148: tata u ha bālākiḥ samitpāṇiḥ praticakrama upāyānīti /
GV04sankharu:1149: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - pratilomarūpam eva tan manye yat kṣatriyo brāhmaṇam upanayeta /
GV04sankharu:1153: taṃ hājātaśatrur āmantrayāñcakre - bṛhan pāṇḍaravāsaḥ soma rājann iti /
GV04sankharu:1157: taṃ hovācājātaśatruḥ - kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa,
GV04sankharu:1160: hitā nama puruṣasya nāḍyo hṛdayāt purītatam abhipratanvanti tad yathā sahasradhā keśo vipāṭitastvāvad aṇvyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1161: piṅgalasyāṇimnyas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya kṛṣṇasya pītasya lohitasya ca /
GV04sankharu:1162: tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kaṃcana paśyati //
GV04sankharu:1165: tad enaṃ vāk sarvair nāmabhiḥ sahāpyeti /
GV04sankharu:1170: yathāgner jvalataḥ sarvā diśo visphuliṅgā vipratiṣṭheran evam evaitasmād ātmanaḥ prāṇā yathāyatanaṃ vipratiṣṭhante prāṇebhyo devāḥ devebhyo lokāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1171: sa eṣa prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīram AtmAnam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1172: tad yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne vopahito viśvaṃbharo vā viśvaṃbarakulāya evam evaiṣa prajñātmedaṃ śarīram ātmānam anupraviṣṭa ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1173: tam etam ātmānam eta ātmāno 'nvavasyante yathā śreṣṭhinaṃ svāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1174: tad yatha śreṣṭhī svair bhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GV04sankharu:1176: evam evaita ātmāna etam ātmānaṃ bhuñjanti /
GV04sankharu:1177: sa yāvad dha vā indra etam ātmānaṃ na vijajñe tāvad enam asurā abhibabhūvuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1178: sa yadā vijajñe 'tha hatvāsurān vijitya sarveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyam ādhipatyaṃ paryait /
GV04sankharu:1179: tathau evaivaṃ vidvān sarvān pāpmano 'pahaty sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānām śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājya ādhipatyaṃ paryeti /
GV04sankharu:1180: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:1186: tan mām avatu tad vaktāram avatvavatu mām avatu vaktāram /
GV04sankharu:1196: śivā naḥ śaṭamā bhava sumṛḍīkā sarasvati mā te vyoma saṃdṛśi /
GV04sankharu:1197: adabdhaṃ mana iṣiraṃ cakṣuḥ sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1201: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1202: ākāśaḥ saṃhitetyasya māṇḍavyo vedayāñ cakre - sa hāviparihṛto mene na me 'sya putreṇa samagād iti /
GV04sankharu:1204: samānaṃ hyatra pituśca putrasya ca vāyuś cākāśaś ca /
GV04sankharu:1207: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ prāṇaḥ saṃhiteti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1208: atha ha smāsya putra āha dīrghaḥ - manasā vā agre kīrtayati tad vācā vadati /
GV04sankharu:1209: tasmān mana eva pūrvarūpaṃ vāg uttararūpaṃ mano vāk prāṇas tveva saṃhiteti /
GV04sankharu:1210: sa eṣo 'śvarathaḥ praṣṭivāhano manovākprāṇasaṃhitaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati /
GV04sankharu:1211: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur etīti nu māṇḍūkeyānām //
GV04sankharu:1214: sa yadi nirbhujaḥ khalu vai vayaṃ madhyamo vāk prāṇena mātā jāyā prajñā vāg bṛhadgatirvālisarvamuttamam //
GV04sankharu:1217: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā vṛṣṭiḥ saṃdhiḥ saṃdhātā /
GV04sankharu:1218: tad utāpi yatraitad balavad anugṛhṇan mahāmegho vṛṣṭiṃ varṣati /
GV04sankharu:1225: yathāsau dyāvāpṛthivyor antareṇākāśa etasminn ākāśe prāṇa āyatto bhavati yathāmuṣminn ākāśe vāyur āyatto bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1226: yathāmūni trīṇi jyotīṃṣyevam imāni puruṣe trīṇi jyotīṃṣi /
GV04sankharu:1227: yathāsau divyāditya evam idaṃ śirasi cakṣuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1228: yathāsāvantarikṣe vidyud evam idam ātmani hṛdayam /
GV04sankharu:1229: yathāyam agniḥ pṛthivyam evam idam upasthe retaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1230: evamiva ha sma sarvata ātmānam anuvidhāyāha - idam eva pūrvarūpam idam uttararūpaṃ mano vāk prāṇas tveva saṃhiteti /
GV04sankharu:1231: sa eṣo ' śvarathaḥ praṣṭivahano manovākprāṇasaṃhitaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati /
GV04sankharu:1232: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ +veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena
GV04sankharu:1235: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ vāyuḥ saṃhitā diśaḥ saṃdhir ādityaḥ saṃdhāteti vaiśvāmitraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1238: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ prāṇaḥ saṃhitā śrotraṃ saṃdhiś cakṣuḥ saṃdhātā /
GV04sankharu:1239: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1241: agniḥ pūrvarūpaṃ candramā uttararūpaṃ vidyut saṃhiteti sūryadattaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1243: athādhyātmam - vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ satyaṃ saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1244: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1246: pṛthivī pūrvarūpaṃ dyaur uttararūpaṃ kālaḥ saṃhiteti rādheyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1248: athādhyātmam - vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ ātmā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1249: sa ya evam etāṃ etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1251: vāk pūrvarūpaṃ mana uttararūpaṃ vidyā saṃhiteti pauṣkarasādiḥ /
GV04sankharu:1252: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1256: sa ya enaṃ prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvan param upavadet śaknuvan kaścic cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ +samadhām /
GV04sankharu:1259: atha ced aśaknuvan manyeta prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīḥ taṃ nāśakaḥ saṃdhātuṃ prāṇas tvā vaṃśo hāsyatītyevainaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1260: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt /
GV04sankharu:1261: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1263: sa yadi prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ bruvantaṃ param upavadet śaknuvantaṃ cen manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsiṣam prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ saṃdhitsituṃ na śaknoṣītyāttha /
GV04sankharu:1265: atha ced aśaknuvantaṃ manyeta - prāṇaṃ vaṃśaṃ samadhitsīs tan nāśakaḥ saṃdhātum /
GV04sankharu:1267: yathā nu kathā ca bruvantaṃ vābruvantaṃ vā brūyād abhyāśam eva yat tat tathā syāt /
GV04sankharu:1268: na tvevānyat kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna eva brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān namo 'stu brāhmaṇebhya iti śauravīro māṇḍūkeyaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1271: pṛthivyāyatanaṃ nirbhujaṃ divāyatanaṃ pratṛṇṇam antartikṣāyatanam ubhayam antareṇa /
GV04sankharu:1272: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavadet /
GV04sankharu:1273: pṛthivīṃ devatām āraḥ pṛthivī tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1274: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded divaṃ devatām āro dyaus tvā devatāriṣyatītyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1275: atha yadyubhayam antareṇa bruvan param upavaded antarikṣaṃ devatām āra antarikṣaṃ tvā devatāriṣyatītiyenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1276: yad dhi saṃdhiṃ vivartayati tan nirbhujasya rūpam /
GV04sankharu:1277: atha yac chuddhe akṣare abhivyāharati tat pratṛṇṇasyāgra u eva /
GV04sankharu:1279: annādyakāmo nirbhujaṃ brūyāt svargakāṃaḥ pratṛṇṇam ubhayakāma ubhayamantareṇa /
GV04sankharu:1280: sa ya enaṃ nirbhujaṃ bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā avarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityenaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1281: atha yadi pratṛṇṇam bruvan param upavaded acyoṣṭhā uttarābhyāṃ sthānābhyām ityevainaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1283: yathā nu kathā ca bruvan vābruvan vā brūyād abhyāśam kuśalād brāhmaṇaṃ brūyād atidyumna evaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūyān nātidyumne ca na brāhmaṇaṃ brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1289: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1291: atha vai vayaṃ brūmo nirbhujavaktrāḥ sma iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1293: tad yāsau mātrā pūrvarūpottarūpe antareṇa yena saṃdhiṃ vivartayati yena mātrāmātraṃ vibhajati yena svarāt svaraṃ vijñāpayati sā saṃhiteti /
GV04sankharu:1294: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1296: atha ha smāsya putra āha madhyamaḥ prātiyodhīputro magadhavāsī pūrvam evākṣaraṃ pūrvarūpam uttaram uttararūpam /
GV04sankharu:1297: tad yāsau mātrā saṃdhivijñāpanī sāma tad bhavati sāmaihāvaṃ saṃhitāṃ manya iti /
GV04sankharu:1298: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mā naḥ stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1299: ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ //
GV04sankharu:1301: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1304: prāṇaḥ pavamānena pavamāno viśvair devair viśve devāḥ svargeṇa lokena svargo loko brahmaṇā saiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1305: sa ya evam etām avaraparāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda evaṃ haiva sa prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena saṃdhīyate yathaiṣāvaraparā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1306: sa yadi pareṇa vopasṛṣṭaḥ svena vārthenābhivyāhared abhivyāharann eva vidyāt - divaṃ saṃhitāgamad viduṣo devān abhivyāhārārtham evaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV04sankharu:1309: mātā pūrvarūpaṃ pitottararūpaṃ prajā saṃhiteti bhārgavaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1310: tad etad ekam eva sarvaṃ abhyanūktam /
GV04sankharu:1311: mātā ca hyevedaṃ pitā ca prajā ca sarvam /
GV04sankharu:1313: aditir hevedaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃcid viśvabhūtam /
GV04sankharu:1314: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣaṃ aditir mātā sā pitā sa putraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1315: viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam //
GV04sankharu:1316: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1318: jāyā pūrvarūpaṃ patir uttararūpaṃ putraḥ saṃhitā retaḥ saṃdhiḥ prajananaṃ saṃdhānam iti sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1320: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1322: prajñā pūrvarūpaṃ śraddhottararūpaṃ karma saṃhitā satyaṃ saṃdhānam iti kāśyapaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1324: tad āhur yat satyasaṃdhā devā iti /
GV04sankharu:1325: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1328: vācā vai vedāḥ saṃdhīyante vācā chandāṃsi vācā mitrāṇi saṃdadhati /
GV04sankharu:1329: tad yatraitad adhīte vā bhāṣate vā vāci tadā prāṇo bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1331: atha yat svapiti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā bhavati prāṇe tadā vāg bhavati prāṇastadā vācaṃ reḷhi. tāv anyonyaṃ rīḷhaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1332: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram āviveśa,
GV04sankharu:1335: taṃ mātā reḷhi sa u reḷhi mātaram //
GV04sankharu:1338: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1340: bṛhadrathaṃtareṇa rūpeṇa saṃhitā saṃdhīyata iti tārkṣyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1341: vāg vai rathaṃtarasya rūpaṃ prāṇo bṛhataḥ /
GV04sankharu:1342: ubhābhyām u khalu saṃhitā saṃdhīyate vācā ca prāṇena ca /
GV04sankharu:1343: etasyāṃ ha smopaniṣadi saṃvatsaraṃ gā rakṣayata iti tārkṣyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1344: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1346: gatiḥ pūrvvarūpaṃ nivṛttir uttararūpaṃ sthitiḥ saṃhiteti jāratkārava ārtabhāgaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1347: tasyām etasyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ dhvaṃsayo nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhāḥ kalāḥ kṣaṇā muhūrtā ahorātrā ardhamāsā māsā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarāś ca saṃdhīyante /
GV04sankharu:1352: athādhyātmam - bhūtaṃ pūrvarūpaṃ bhaviṣyad uttararūpaṃ bhavat saṃhiteti kālasaṃdhiḥ /
GV04sankharu:1353: tad etad ṛcābhyuditam - mahat tan nāma guhyaṃ puruspṛg yena bhutaṃ janayo yena bhavyam /
GV04sankharu:1354: pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyaṃ priyāḥ samaviśanta pañca //
GV04sankharu:1356: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1359: pañcemāni mahābhūtāni bhavantīti ha smāha vāliśikhayaniḥ /
GV04sankharu:1360: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyautīṃṣi tāni mithaḥ saṃhitani bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1361: aatha yānyanyāni kṣudrāṇi mahābhūtaiḥ saṃdhīyante saiṣā sarvavibhūtasaṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1362: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1364: sarvā vāg brahmeti ha smāha lauhikyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1365: ye tu kecana śabdā vācam eva tāṃ vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1366: tad apyetad ṛṣir āha - ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmīti /
GV04sankharu:1368: sa ya evam etāṃ saṃhitāṃ veda saṃdhīyate prajayā paśubhir yaśasā brahmavarcasena svargeṇa lokena sarvam āyur eti /
GV04sankharu:1369: yatā caitad brahma kāmarūpi kāmacāri bhavatyevaṃ haiva sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kāmarūpī kāmacārī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1370: ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:1374: prāṇo vaṃśa iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1375: tadu yathā śālāvaṃśe sarve 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāḥ syur evam evaitasmin prāṇe sarva ātmā samāhitaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1376: tasyaitadyātmanaḥ prāṇa ūṣmarūpam asthīni sparśarūpaṃ majjānaḥ svararūpaṃ māṃsaṃ lohitam ityetac caturtham antasthārūpam iti /
GV04sankharu:1377: treyaṃ tveva na etat proktam iti ha smāha hvastro māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1378: tasyaitasya trayasya trīṇītaḥ ṣaṣṭiśatāni bhavanti saṃdhīnāṃ trīṇītas tāni saptaviṃśatiśatāni bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1381: sa eṣa saṃvatsarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1382: sa ya evam etaṃ saṃvatsarasaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda saṃvatsarasya sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute /
GV04sankharu:1383: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur etyasyāruṇikeyo devayāñcakre //
GV04sankharu:1395: eṣa u ha vai saṃpratiprāṇo yan majjā etad retaḥ na vā ṛte prāṇād retasaḥ siddhir asti /
GV04sankharu:1396: yad vā ṛte prāṇād retaḥ sicyeta tat pūyen na saṃbhavet /
GV04sankharu:1397: yān saṃdhīn adhidaivatam avocāma parvāṇi tānyadhyātmam /
GV04sankharu:1401: sa eṣo 'haḥsaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaś śrotramayaś chandomayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1402: sa ya evam etad ahaḥsaṃmānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandomayaṃ manomayaṃ vāmayam ātmānaṃ veda ahnāṃ sāyaujyaṃ salokatāṃ sarūpatāṃ sabhakṣatām aśnute /
GV04sankharu:1403: putrī paśumān bhavati sarvam āyur eti //
GV04sankharu:1405: catvāraḥ puruṣā iti vāstyaḥ - śarīrapuruṣaś chandaḥpuruṣo vedepuruṣo mahāpuruṣa iti /
GV04sankharu:1406: śarīrapuruṣa iti yam avocam ya evāyaṃ daivika ātmā tasyaitasya yo 'yam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā sa rasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1409: vedapuruṣa iti yam avocāma yena devān vedargvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti tasyaitasya brahmarasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1410: tasmād brahmiṣṭhaṃ brahmāṇam ṛtvijaṃ kurvīta yo yajñasyolvaṇaṃ vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1411: mahāpuruṣa iti yam avocāma saṃvatsara eva tasyaitasyāsāv ādityo rasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1412: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad iti vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1415: citraṃ devānām udagād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
GV04sankharu:1416: āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //
GV04sankharu:1418_0: etām evānuvidyāṃ saṃhitāṃ saṃdhīyamānāṃ manya iti ha smāha vātsyaḥ -- etam u haiva
GV04sankharu:1418_1: bahvṛcā mahadukthe mīmāṃsanta etam agnāv adhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogā etam
GV04sankharu:1418_2: asyām etam antarikṣa etaṃ divi etam agnāv etaṃ vāyāv etaṃ candramasy etaṃ nakṣatreṣv
GV04sankharu:1418_3: etam apsv etam oṣadhīṣv etaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣv etam akṣareṣv etam eva brahmetyupāsate /
GV04sankharu:1421: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram /
GV04sankharu:1422: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
GV04sankharu:1424: sa eṣo 'kṣarasaṃmānaś cakṣurmayaḥ śrotramayaś chandamayo manomayo vāṅmaya ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1425: sa ya evam etam akṣarasaṃānaṃ cakṣurmayaṃ śrotramayaṃ chandamayaṃ manomayaṃ vāṅmayam ātmānaṃ parasmai śaṃsati dugdhadohā asya vedā bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1429: yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti /
GV04sankharu:1430: yad īṃ śṛnoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti na hi praveda sukṛtasya panthām //
GV04sankharu:1432: nāsyānūkte vāco bhāgo astīty eva tad āha tan na parasmā etad ahaḥ śaṃset /
GV04sankharu:1433: nāgniṃ cinuyān na mahāvratena stuyān ned ātmano 'pihīyā iti /
GV04sankharu:1434: sa yaś cāyam aśarīraḥ prajñātmā yaś cāsāv āditya ekam etad ity avocāma tau yatra vipradṛśyete //
GV04sankharu:1436: candramā ivādityo dṛśyate na raśmayaḥ prādur bhavanti /
GV04sankharu:1439: saṃpareto 'syātmā na ciram iva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1440: sa yat karaṇīyaṃ manyeta tat kuryāt /
GV04sankharu:1441: athāpyādarśe vodake vā jihmaśirasaṃ vāśirasaṃ vātmānaṃ paśyen na vā paśyet /
GV04sankharu:1443: athāpi cchidrā chāyā bhavati na vā bhavati tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1444: athāpi cchidra ivādityo rathanābhir ivākhyāyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1445: athāpi nīla ivāgnir dṛśyeta yathā mayūragrīvā mahāmeghe vā marīcīr iva paśyet /
GV04sankharu:1447: abhra enāṃ mna paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1448: athāpy apidhāyākṣiṇī upekṣeta tatraitad varāṭakānīva na paśyet tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1450: ya eṣo 'gner iva jvalataḥ śabdo rathasyevopabdis taṃ na yadā śṛṇuyāt tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1451: athāpi viparyaste kanyake dṛśyete dvijihmevā na vā dṛśyetetad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1452: sa yo 'to 'śruto 'mato 'vijñāto 'dṛṣṭo 'nādiṣṭo 'ghuṣṭaḥ śrotā mantā vijñātā draṣṭādeṣṭā ghoṣṭā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āntaraḥ puruṣaḥ sa ma ātmeti
GV04sankharu:1453: vidyāt / sa utkrāmann evaitam aśarīraṃ prajñātmānam abhisaṃpadyate vijahātītaraṃ dauhikam /
GV04sankharu:1458: pṛthivyā rūpaṃ sparśā antarikṣasyoṣmāṇo divaḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1459: agne rūpaṃ sparśā vāyor ūṣmāṇa ādityasya svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1460: ṛgvedasya rūpaṃ sparśā yajurvedasyoṣmāṇaḥ sāmavedasya svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1461: rathantarasya rūpaṃ sparśā vāmadevyasyoṣmāṇo bṛhataḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1462: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇo manasaḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1463: prāṇasya rūpaṃ sparśā apānasyoṣmāṇa udānasya svarāḥ svarā iti punardattaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1464: eṣa u haiva sarvāṃ vācaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda //
GV04sankharu:1466: atha khalv iyaṃ daivī vīṇā bhavati tadanukṛtir asau mānuṣī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1467: tad yatheyaṃ śastravatī tardmavatī bhavaty evam evāsau śastravatī tardmavatī bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1468: tad yathāsyāḥ śira evam amuṣyāḥ śiraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1469: tad yathāsyai vaṃśa evam amuṣyā daṇḍaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1470: tad yathāsyā udaram evam amuṣyā ambhaṇaṃ /
GV04sankharu:1471: tad yathāsyai mukhanāsike akṣiṇī ity evam amuṣyāś chidrāṇi /
GV04sankharu:1472: tad yathāsyā aṅgulinigrahā upastaraṇānīty evam amuṣyāḥ parvāṇi /
GV04sankharu:1473: tad yathāsyā aṅgulaya evam amuṣyās tantryaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1475: tad yathāsyāḥ svarā evam amuṣyāḥ svarāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1476: tad yathā haiveyaṃ romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavaty evam evāsau romaśena carmaṇāpihitā bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1477: romaśena ha sma carmaṇā purā vīṇā apidadhati /
GV04sankharu:1479_0: sa ya evam etāṃ daivīṃ vīṇāṃ veda śrutavadanatamo bhavati bhūmiprāsya kīrtir bhavati
GV04sankharu:1479_1: +śuśrūṣante hāsya parṣatsu bhāṣyamāṇasyedam astu yad ayam īhate yatrāryā vāg vadati vidur enaṃ tatra //
GV04sankharu:1482: tad yatheyaṃ akuśalena vādayitrāvīṇārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam evākuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā na kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati /
GV04sankharu:1483: tad yathā haiveyaṃ kuśalena vādayitrā vīṇārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vīṇārthaṃ sādhayaty evam eva kuśalena vaktrā vāg ārabdhā kṛtsnaṃ vāg arthaṃ sādhayati /
GV04sankharu:1484: tasyai vā etasyai vīṇāyai yā tviṣiḥ sā saṃhiteti kātyāyanīputro jātūkarṇyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1485: atha ha smaitat kṛtsnahārito brāhmaṇam evodāharati //
GV04sankharu:1487: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā vyasraṃsata sa chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat /
GV04sankharu:1488: tad yac chandobhir ātmānaṃ samadadhat tasmāt saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1489: tasyai vā etasyai saṃhitāyai ṇakaro balaṃ ṣakāraḥ prāṇa ātmā saṃhitā /
GV04sankharu:1490: athaiṣā kṣudramiśrā vikṛtis tāni nakhāni romāṇi vyañjanānīti /
GV04sankharu:1491: sa yo 'tra vicikitset saṇakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṇakāram iti saṇakāram eva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1492: evam eva yo 'tra vicikitset saṣakāraṃ eva brūyād ṛte ṣakāram iti saṣakāram eva brūyāt /
GV04sankharu:1493: tau vā etau ṇakāraṣakārau vidvān anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīyītāyuṣyam iti vidyād evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1494: atha vāg itihāsapurāṇaṃ yac cānyat kiṃcid brāhmīkṛtyevādhīyīta tad apy evam eva vidyāt /
GV04sankharu:1495: te yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca māṇḍūkeyīyam adhyāyaṃ prabrūmas tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha hrasvo māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1496: atha yad vayam anusaṃhitam ṛco 'dhīmahe yac ca svādhyāyam adhīmahe tena no ṇakāraṣakārā upāptāv iti ha smāha sthaviraḥ śākalyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1497: etad dha sma vai tad vidvāṃsa āhuḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe kimarthā vayam adheṣyāmahe vāci hi prāṇaṃ juhumaḥ prāṇe vācaṃ yo hy eva prabhavaḥ sa evāpyaya iti /
GV04sankharu:1499: nānantevāsine brūyān nāsaṃvatsaravāsine nābrahmacāriṇe nāvedavide nāpavaktra ity ācāryā ity ācāryāḥ //
GV04sankharu:1511: sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭho dīkṣe mā mā hiṃsīḥ //
GV04sankharu:1513: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca svānāṃ bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1514: prāṇo vai jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca /
GV04sankharu:1515: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhāṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati vāg vai vasiṣṭhā /
GV04sankharu:1516: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca cakṣur ha pratiṣṭhā /
GV04sankharu:1517: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ saṃpadyante śrotraṃ ha vā u saṃpat /
GV04sankharu:1518: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatano ha svānāṃ bhavati mano vā āyatanam /
GV04sankharu:1519: atha hemā devatāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyābruvan ko vai naḥ śreṣṭha iti /
GV04sankharu:1520: sa hovāca prajāpatir yasmin va utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭham iva manyate sa vai śreṣṭha iti //
GV04sankharu:1523: yathā mūkā avadantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1526: yathāndhā apaśyantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1529: yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā dhyāyanto manasaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1532: yathā bālā amanasaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaḥ cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇaivam iti //
GV04sankharu:1535: tatas tad yatheha saindhavaḥ suhayaḥ paḍbīśaśaṅkūn saṃkhided evam asau prāṇān samakhidat /
GV04sankharu:1536: te ha sametyocur bhagavan motkramīr iti /
GV04sankharu:1537: sa hovāca prāṇaḥ kiṃ me 'nnaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV04sankharu:1539: kiṃ me vāso bhaviṣyatīty āpa iti hocuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1540: tasmād vā ayam aśiṣyan purastāc copariṣṭāc cādbhiḥ paridadhāti /
GV04sankharu:1541: lambhuko hāsya vāso bhavaty anagno hi bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1542: had dha smaitat satyakāmo jābālo gośrute vaiyāghrapadyāyoktvovāca /
GV04sankharu:1543: apy evaṃ śuṣkasya sthāṇoḥ prabrūyāj jayerann asya śākhāḥ praroheyuḥ palāśanīti /
GV04sankharu:1544: vanaspate śatavalśo viroheti dyāṃ mā lekhīr antarikṣaṃ mā mā hiṃsīr iti ha yājñavalkyaḥ //
GV04sankharu:1546_0: atha yadi mahaj jigamiṣet trirātraṃ dīkṣitvāmāvāsyāyāṃ sarvauṣadasya manthaṃ dadhimadhubhyām
GV04sankharu:1546_1: upamanthyāgnim upassamādhāya parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyottarato
GV04sankharu:1546_2: 'gneḥ kaṃse manthaṃ kṛtvā hutvā homān manthe saṃpātaṃ ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1547: jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1548: pratiṣṭhāyai svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1549: saṃpade svāhety agnau hutvā manthe saṃpātam ānayet /
GV04sankharu:1550: tat savitur vareṇyam iti pacchaḥ prāśya tat savitur vṛṇīmaha iti paccha ācāmati mahāvyāhṛtibhiś caturthaṃ nirṇijya kāṃsyaṃ carmaṇi vā sthaṇḍile vā saṃviśati /
GV04sankharu:1551: sa yadi striyaṃ paśyet samṛddhaṃ karmeti vidyāt samṛddhaṃ karmeti vidyāt //
GV04sankharu:1557: etā ha vai devatāḥ puruṣa eva pratiṣṭhitā agnir vāci vāyuḥ prāṇa ādityaś cakṣuṣi candramā manasi diśaḥ śrotra āpo retasi /
GV04sankharu:1558: etāsu ha vai sarvāsu hutaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca /
GV04sankharu:1559: so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1564: pṛthivī tṛptā yat kiṃcit pṛthhivyāpihitaṃ bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1565: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1570: ākāśas tṛpto yat kiṃcākāśenāpihitam bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1571: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1576: dyaus tṛptā yat kiṃcid divāpihitam bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1577: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1587: saṃvatsaras tṛpto yat kiṃcit saṃvatsareṇāpihitam bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1588: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1593: avāntaradiśas tṛptā yat kiṃcāvāntaradigbhir apihitam bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1594: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1600: samudro tṛpto yat kiṃcit samudreṇāpihitam bhavad bhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ tat sarvaṃ tarpayati /
GV04sankharu:1601: ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca so 'śnāti sa pibati sa tṛpyati sa tarpayati //
GV04sankharu:1603: sa tṛptas tad etad vairājaṃ daśavidhaṃ agnihotraṃ bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1605: apāno gārhapatyo vyāno 'nvāhāryapacano mano dhūmo manyur arcir dantā aṅgārāḥ śraddhā payo vāk samit satyam āhutiḥ prajñātmā sa rasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1606: tad etad vairājaṃ daśavidhaṃ agnihotraṃ hutaṃ bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1607: rohobhyāṃ rohobhyām abhyārūḷham abhi svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayati ya evaṃ vidvān aśnāti ca pibati cāśayati ca pāyayati ca /
GV04sankharu:1608: atha ya idam avidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti yathāṅgārān apohya bhasmani hutaṃ tādṛk tatyās tādṛk tat syāt //
GV04sankharu:1613_0: tasminn etā devatā āveśayad vācy agniṃ prāṇe vāyuṃ apāne vidyuta udāne parjanyaṃ
GV04sankharu:1613_1: cakṣuṣy ādityaṃ manasi candramasaṃ śrotre diśaḥ śarīre pṛthivīṃ retasy apo bala indraṃ
GV04sankharu:1613_2: manyāv īśānaṃ mūrdhany ākāśaṃ ātmani brahma /
GV04sankharu:1614: sa yathā mahān amṛtakumbhaḥ pinvamānas tiṣṭhed evaṃ haiva sa tasthau /
GV04sankharu:1615: atha hemā devatā īkṣāṃ cakrire kim ayam asmābhiḥ puruṣaḥ kariṣyati kiṃ vā vayam anena /
GV04sankharu:1618: atha hedaṃ śarīraṃ riktam iva parisuṣiraṃ sa hekṣāñcakre prajāpatī randhrāya na kṣamam /
GV04sankharu:1621: tā hopāṣrṣṭāḥ sukhaṃ alabhamānā imam eva puruṣaṃ punaḥ pratyāviviśuḥ //
GV04sankharu:1636: sa yathā mahān vṛkṣa ārdra upasiktamūlas tiṣṭhed evaṃ haiva sa tasthau //
GV04sankharu:1638: athāyaṃ puruṣaḥ preṣyan purā saṃvatsarāt saṃvatsarasya dṛṣṭīḥ paśyati /
GV04sankharu:1639: chidrā chāyā bhavati na vā bhavati /
GV04sankharu:1640: mahāmeghe vā marīcīr iva paśyed anabhre vā vidyutaṃ paśyed abhra enāṃ na paśyet /
GV04sankharu:1641: akṣiṇī vā apidhāya varāṭakānīvā na paśyati /
GV04sankharu:1643: nāsmiṁl loke ramate nainaṃ manaś chandayati /
GV04sankharu:1647_0: puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti varāha enaṃ hanti markaṭa enaṃ hanti
GV04sankharu:1647_1: enaṃ hanti bisāni khādayati suvarṇaṃ bhakṣayitvāvagiraty ekapauṇḍarīkaṃ dhārayati
GV04sankharu:1648_0: sa yady eteṣāṃ kiṃcit paśyet pāṇḍuradarśanāṃ kālīṃ strīṃ muktakeśāṃ muṇḍāṃ tailābhyaṅgaṃ
GV04sankharu:1648_1: kausumbhaparidhānaṃ gītāny uṣṭrārohanaṃ dakṣiṇāśāgamanādīni vīkṣyopoṣya pāyasaṃ sthālīpākaṃ
GV04sankharu:1648_2: śrapayitvā sarūpavatsāyā goḥ payasi na tv eva tu kṛṣṇāyā agnim upasamādhāya parisamuhya
GV04sankharu:1648_3: paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācya sruveṇājyahutīr juhoti //
GV04sankharu:1663: athaitad ājyāvaśeṣaṃ sthālīpāke samavaninīya sthālīpākasyopaghātaṃ juhoti //
GV04sankharu:1665: vāci me 'gniḥ pratiṣṭhito vāg hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1666: prāṇe me vāyuḥ pratiṣṭhito prāṇo hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1667: apāne me vidyutaḥ pratiṣṭhitā apāno hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1668: udāne me parjanyaḥ pratiṣṭhita udānaṃ hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1669: cakṣuṣi ma ādityaḥ pratiṣṭhitaś cakṣur hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1670: manasi me candramāḥ pratiṣṭhito mano hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1671: śrotre me diśaḥ pratiṣṭhitā diśo hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1672: śarīre me pṛthhivī pratiṣṭhitā pṛthivī hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1673: bale ma indraḥ pratiṣṭhitā balaṃ hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1674: manyau ma īśānaḥ pratiṣṭhito manyur hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1676: mūrdhā hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1677: ātmani me brahma pratiṣṭhitam ātmā hṛdaye hṛdayam ātmani tat satyaṃ devānāṃ māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1680_0: aśmā jāgatam ayas traiṣṭubhaṃ loham auṣṇihaṃ sīsaṃ kākubhaṃ rajataṃ svārājyaṃ suvarṇaṃ
GV04sankharu:1680_1: gāyatram annaṃ vairājaṃ tṛptir ānuṣṭubhaṃ nākaṃ sāmrājyaṃ bṛhaspatir bārhataṃ brahma
GV04sankharu:1680_2: pāṅktaṃ prajāpatir ātichandasaṃ sāvitrī sarvavedachandasena chandaseti //
GV04sankharu:1683: puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ sūtram annaṃ granthis taṃ granthim udgrathnāmy annakāmaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1684: mṛtyave brāhmaṇaṃ api sarvam āyur aśīyāyuṣmān māham akāmo mariṣyāmy annavān annādo bhūyāsaṃ svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1685: aya iva sthiro vasāni traiṣṭubhena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1686: loham iva sthiro vasāny auṣṇihena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1687: sīsam iva sthiro vasāni kākubhena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1688: rajatam iva sthiro vasāni svarājyena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1689: suvarṇam iva sthiro vasāni gāyatreṇa chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1690: annam iva sthiro vasāni vairājena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1691: tṛptir iva sthiro vasāny ānuṣṭubhena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1693: sāmrājyena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1694: bṛhaspatir iva sthiro vasāni bārhatena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1695: brahmeva sthiro vasāni pāṅktena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1696: prajāpatir iva sthiro vasāny ātichandasena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1697: sāvitrīr iva sthiro vasāni sarvavedachandasena chandasā puruṣo maṇiḥ prāṇaḥ ... svāhā /
GV04sankharu:1698: priyāyai vā jāyāyai priyāya vāntevāsine 'nyasmai vāpi yasmai kāmayeta tasmā ucchiṣṭaṃ dadyāt /
GV04sankharu:1699: sa hāpi śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvati punaḥ punaḥ prayuñjāno jīvaty eva jīvaty eva //
GV04sankharu:1703: om / hastivarcasaṃ prathatāṃ bṛhad vayo yad adityai tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva /
GV04sankharu:1704: tan mahyaṃ samaduḥ sarva eta ādityāso adityā saṃvidānāḥ // 1//
GV04sankharu:1706: yat te varco jātavedo bṛhad bhavaty āhitam /
GV04sankharu:1707: tena mā varcasā tvam agne varcasvinaṃ kuru // 2//
GV04sankharu:1709: yac ca varco vā puruṣe yac ca hastiṣv āhitam /
GV04sankharu:1710: suvarṇe goṣu yad varco mayi tad dhastivarcasam // 3//
GV04sankharu:1712: yad akṣeṣu hiraṇyeṣu goṣv aśveṣu yad yaśaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1715: mayi bhargo mayi maho mayi yajñasya yad yaśaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1716: tan mayi prajāpatir divi divam iva dṛṃhatu //5//
GV04sankharu:1718: aśvinā sāragheṇa mā sam aṅktāṃ madhunā payaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1721: ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvān dhanaṃjayo dharuṇo dhārayiṣṇuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1722: rujan sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan ā roha māṃ mahate saubhagāya // 7//
GV04sankharu:1724: prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jatāni pari tā babhūva /
GV04sankharu:1725: yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām // 8//
GV04sankharu:1727: ayaṃ sano nudatāṃ me sapatnān indra iva vṛtraṃ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā /
GV04sankharu:1728: agnir iva kakṣaṃ vibhṛtaḥ purutrā vāteṣu nas tigmajambho 'nu mārṣṭi // 9//
GV04sankharu:1730: ayaṃ sano yo 'nuvādī kīla iva vṛtraṃ vi puro ruroja /
GV04sankharu:1731: anenendro vi mṛdho vihatyā śatrūyatām ābharā bhojanāni //10//
GV04sankharu:1733: jayendra śatrūñ jahi śūra dasyūn vṛtraṃ hatveva kuliśenā vi vṛśca /
GV04sankharu:1734: augha iva śāpān pra ṇudāt sapatnāñ jahyāt sapatnān svadhitir vaneva // 11//
GV04sankharu:1736: anu vṛśca madhyāt prati vṛścopariṣṭād vi vṛśca paścāt prati śūra vṛśca /
GV04sankharu:1737: tvayā praṇuttān maghavann amitrān śūra riṣantaṃ maruto 'nu yantu // 12//
GV04sankharu:1739: tvāṃ rudrair hetibhiḥ pinvamānā indraṃ manvānā maruto juṣanta /
GV04sankharu:1740: suparṇāḥ kaṅkāḥ pra mṛśanto enān mahīyatāṃ daṃṣṭrī vardhaneṣu // 13//
GV04sankharu:1742: brahmaṇuttasya maghavan pṛtanyato viṣvag indra bhaṅgāḥ patantu /
GV04sankharu:1743: mā jñātāram īśata mā pratiṣṭhāṃ mitho vighnānā upa yānti mṛtyum // 14//
GV04sankharu:1745: agne yaśasvin yaśase sam arpayendravatīm apacitim ihā vaha /
GV04sankharu:1746: ayaṃ mūrdhā parameṣṭhī suvarcāḥ sajātānām uttamaśloko astu //15//
GV04sankharu:1748: bhadraṃ paśyanta upa sedur āgan tato dīkṣām ṛṣayaḥ svarvidaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1749: tataḥ kṣatraṃ balam ojaś ca jātaṃ tad asmai devā abhi saṃ namantām // 16//
GV04sankharu:1751: dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī suvarccāḥ /
GV04sankharu:1752: stomāṃś chandāṃsi nivido ma āhur etasmai rāṣṭram abhi saṃ namantām // 17//
GV04sankharu:1754: abhy ā vartadhvam upa sevatāgnim ayaṃ śāstādhipatir no astu /
GV04sankharu:1755: asya vijñānam anu saṃ rabhadhvam imaṃ paścād anu jīvātha sarve // 18//
GV04sankharu:1757: alardo nāma jāto 'si purā sūryāt puroṣasaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1760: nārdhe pramīyeta tared dviṣantaṃ kalpeta vākyaṃ pṛtanāḥ saheta /
GV04sankharu:1761: pramāyukaṃ tasya dviṣantam āhur irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti //20//
GV04sankharu:1763: na sa śaptam aśnāti kilbiṣaṃ kṛtaṃ nainaṃ divyo varuṇo hanti bhītam /
GV04sankharu:1764: nainaṃ kruddhaṃ manyavo 'bhi yantīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 21//
GV04sankharu:1766: nāsya tvacaṃ hiṃsati jātvedā na māṃsam aśnāti na hanti tāni /
GV04sankharu:1767: śatāyur asmiñ jaradaṣṭiḥ praitīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 22//
GV04sankharu:1769: nāsya prajā duṣyati jāyamānā na śailago bhavati na pāpakṛtyā /
GV04sankharu:1770: nānyan mithas tasya kuleṣu jāyata irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 23//
GV04sankharu:1772: nāsyāpavādā na pravādakā gṛhe na saṃpatatryo na viveśa tasmai /
GV04sankharu:1773: nāsminn alakṣmīḥ kurute niveśanam irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 24//
GV04sankharu:1776: na jambhako nāpy asuro na yakṣaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1777: na sūtikā tasya kuleṣu jāyate irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti //25//
GV04sankharu:1779: nainaṃ vyāghro na vṛko na dvīpī na śvāpadaṃ hiṃsati kiṃcanainam /
GV04sankharu:1780: na hastinaṃ kruddham upaiti bhītim irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 26//
GV04sankharu:1782: nainaṃ sarpo na pṛdākur hinasti na vṛściko na tiraścīnarājiḥ /
GV04sankharu:1783: nainaṃ kṛṣṇo 'hir abhi saṃhata irāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 27//
GV04sankharu:1785: nainaṃ pramattaṃ varuṇo hinasti na makaro na grahaḥ śiṃśumāraḥ /
GV04sankharu:1786: pārāvarāc chivam asmai kṛṇotīrāmaṇiṃ bailvaṃ yo bibhartti // 28//
GV04sankharu:1790: ogha iva śāpān pra ṇudāt sapatnān /
GV04sankharu:1795: anenendro vṛtram ahann ṛṣiṇā ca manīṣiṇā //30//
GV04sankharu:1798: nāga iva pūrvapādābhyām abhi tiṣṭha pṛtanyataḥ // 31//
GV04sankharu:1800: āgād ayaṃ bailvo maṇiḥ sapatnakṣapaṇo vṛṣā /
GV04sankharu:1801: taṃ paśyanti kavayaḥ sarvavīrā yathā sapatnān samare saheyuḥ // 32//
GV04sankharu:1803: anṛtaṃ me maṇau sūtram aśvināv api nahyatām /
GV04sankharu:1804: bailvaḥ sahasravīryo 'si mā te bhartā riṣam aham // 33//
GV04sankharu:1806: ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvān dhanaṃjayo dharuṇo dhārayiṣṇuḥ /
GV04sankharu:1807: rujan sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan ā roha māṃ mahate saubhagāya // 34//
GV04sankharu:1809: prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jatāni pari tā babhūva /
GV04sankharu:1810: yatkāmas te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām // 35//
GV04sankharu:1815_0: bhūtikāmaḥ puṣpeṇa trirātropoṣito jīvato hastino dantān mātrām uddhṛtyāgnim upasamādhāya
GV04sankharu:1815_1: parisamuhya paristīrya paryukṣya dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyottarato 'gneḥ kaṃse maṇiṃ kṛtvā
GV04sankharu:1816: hastivarcasam ity etābhiḥ pratyṛcam aṣṭābhiḥ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā /
GV04sankharu:1817: ata evottaraṃ ṣaḍbhir hṛdayaśūlāgramaṇiṃ pratodāgramaṇiṃ vā muśalāgramaṇiṃ vā khadirasāramaṇiṃ vā māṃsaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt /
GV04sankharu:1818: ata evottaraṃ catasṛbhir vṛṣabhaśṛṅgāgramaṇiṃ ghṛtaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt /
GV04sankharu:1819: ata evottaraṃ ekayairaṇḍamaṇiṃ tilaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāt /
GV04sankharu:1820: ata evottaraṃ ṣoḷaśabhir bailvaṃ saptarātraṃ madhusarpiṣor vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyād ghṛtād ullupta ity etayarcā /
GV04sankharu:1821_0: ata evottaraṃ pañcabhir mahāvarāsyodohaṃ mudgaudane vāsayitvā trirātram ekāṃ vā badhnīyāc
GV04sankharu:1821_1: chaktau sati prathamaṃ hastichāyāyāṃ vaiyāghre vāpi carmaṇy āsīno vāpi juhuyād āsīno vāpi juhuyāt //
GV04sankharu:1827: tad u ha vātmā draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavya iti /
GV04sankharu:1828: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena vividiṣanti brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā yajñenānāśakena ceti māṇḍūkeyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1829: tasmād evaṃvic chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyed iti māṇḍavyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1830: yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇeṣu sa eṣa neti nety ātmā na gṛhya idaṃ brahmedaṃ kṣatram ime devā ime vedā ime lokā imāni sarvāṇi bhūtānīdaṃ sarvaṃ yad ayam ātmā /
GV04sankharu:1831: sa eṣa tat tvam asīty ātmāvagamyo 'haṃ brahmāsmīti /
GV04sankharu:1832: tad etad brahmāpūrvam aparam anaparam anantaram abāhyam ayam ātmā brahma sarvānubhūr ity anuśāsanam iti yājñavalkyaḥ /
GV04sankharu:1833: tad etan nāputrāya nānantevāsine vā brūyād iti /
GV04sankharu:1834: ya imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād idam eva tato bhūya idam eva tato bhūya ity anuśāsanam /
GV04sankharu:1835: tām etām upaniṣadaṃ vedaśiro na yathā kathaṃ cana vadet /
